channel.title: The Best Ideas Podcast
channel.description: Host Taylor Shrum, uses the tool of conversation with guests to analyze ideas that influence us today and have been valued across time.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Host Taylor Shrum, uses the tool of conversation with guests to analyze ideas that influence us today and have been valued across time.
channel.itunes:summary: Host Taylor Shrum, uses the tool of conversation with guests to analyze ideas that influence us today and have been valued across time.
channel.itunes:keywords: Taylor Shrum, Tess Media, The Best Ideas, Best Ideas, Ideas, Philosophy, The Best Ideas Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Tess Media

item.title: Ep 4. Dance - (ft. Grace Parent)
item.description: Taylor discusses dance with a successful local dancer named Grace Parent.
item.itunes:subtitle: Taylor discusses dance with a successful local dancer named Grace Parent.

item.title: Ep. 3 - (ft. Tyler Dixon and Joey Steshyn)
item.description: Tyler and Joey join host, Taylor Shrum, to take a deep dive into the world of music.

item.title: Ep. 2 Community - (ft. Kenny Armstrong)
item.description: Kenny is an aspiring twitch streamer who sees the community he is building as the end to his efforts. Taylor and Kenny explore how the idea of community is situated in the 2018 psyche.
item.itunes:subtitle: Kenny is an aspiring twitch streamer who sees the community he is building as the end to his efforts. Taylor and Kenny explore how the idea of community is situated in the 2018 psyche.
item.itunes:summary: Kenny is an aspiring twitch streamer who sees the community he is building as the end to his efforts. Taylor and Kenny explore how the idea of community is situated in the 2018 psyche.
item.itunes:keywords: Taylor Shrum, The Best Ideas, Best Ideas, Kenny Armstrong, theguykennygames
item.itunes:author: Tess Media

item.title: Ep 1. Initiative - (ft. Matthew Farina)
item.description: Initiative is one of the best ideas and it’s behind all of humanity's greatest innovations.
